    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public static void clear()

      • clear

        public static void clear(int milestoneIndex)
        This method removes a MilestoneViewModel from the cache. It is used by the TransactionPruner to remove milestones that were deleted in the database, so that the runtime environment correctly reflects the database state.
        Parameters:
        milestoneIndex - the index of the milestone

      • findClosestNextMilestone

        public static MilestoneViewModel findClosestNextMilestone(Tangle tangle,
                                                          int index,
                                                          int maxIndex)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method looks for the next milestone after a given index. In contrast to the next(com.iota.iri.storage.Tangle) method we do not rely on the insertion order in the database but actively search for the milestone that was issued next by the coordinator (coo-order preserved).
        Parameters:
        tangle - Tangle object which acts as a database interface
        index - milestone index where the search shall start
        maxIndex - milestone index where the search shall stop
        Returns:
        the milestone which follows directly after the given index or null if none was found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong while loading entries from the database

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method creates a human readable string representation of the milestone. It can be used to directly append the milestone in error and debug messages.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        human readable string representation of the milestone
